fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a faction during the day. Any player whose role is in this faction will have their ability fail if they target you the following night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All abilities that target you will fail if they are from the faction that you chose during the day. Any abilities that were processed before yours will still take affect except for any abilities that resolve at the beginning of the night.
- When this role rolls, it will be determined what this role will become at the end of the game.
- If the player with this role survives until the end of the game, they will be able to make the role that this slot will turn into.
- If you are killed at night, the first player that sent in their ability that led to your death will be able to make the role that this slot will turn into.
- If you are lynched during the day, the last player that voted you will be able to make the role that this slot will turn into.
- This slot must turn into another Neutral Benign role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game.
